DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy and safety of Exubera速 vs Lantus速 in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Exubera速 and Lantus速
DOC.criteria: Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2 on oral agents Age > 30 years Severe Asthma, severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Smoking
